mapper.select: select b.book_name, b.book_price, b.book_cover, c.o_qty from payment a, book b, ordered_cart c where a.id=#{param1} and a.order_num=#{param2} and a.cart_num = c.o_cart_num and c.o_book_num = b.book_num
select b.book_num from payment a, book b, ordered_cart c where a.id=#{param1} and a.order_num=#{param2} and a.cart_num = c.o_cart_num and c.o_book_num = b.book_num
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_num, order_num, id, rev_title, rev_rating, rev_content, book_num, rev_create_date) values (review_num.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))
